TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SearchResult extends System.Object

summary.span: 類別會封裝 Active Directory 網域服務階層架構中的節點，它是透過 在搜尋期間所傳回的。

span.span: The class encapsulates a node in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy that is returned during a search through .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry GetDirectoryEntry() cil managed

summary.span: 從 Active Directory 網域服務階層架構中擷取對應至 的 。

span.span: Retrieves the that corresponds to the from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用當您想要查看即時的項目，而不是透過傳回的項目，或當您想要在叫用方法所傳回的物件。Use when you want to look at the live entry instead of the entry that was returned through , or when you want to invoke a method on the object that was returned. > [!NOTE] > 呼叫在每個透過傳回可能會很慢。Calling on each returned through can be slow. ## Examples 下列範例是在此範例的摘錄。The following example is an excerpt of the example in . 原始範例建立新物件所要的路徑，並使用方法以初始化搜尋。The original example creates a new object with the desired path and uses the method to initiate the search. 在執行搜尋之後, 此範例會使用方法來擷取即時的目錄項目在搜尋結果中所識別。After performing the search, the example uses the method to retrieve the live directory entry that is identified in the search results. ```vb ' Get the 'DirectoryEntry' that corresponds to 'mySearchResult'. Dim myDirectoryEntry As DirectoryEntry = mySearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry() Console.WriteLine(ControlChars.Newline + "The name of the 'myDirectoryEntry' " + _ "directory entry that corresponds to the " + _ "'mySearchResult' search result is : {0}" + _ ControlChars.Newline, myDirectoryEntry.Name) ``` ```csharp // Get the 'DirectoryEntry' that corresponds to 'mySearchResult'. DirectoryEntry myDirectoryEntry = mySearchResult.GetDirectoryEntry(); Console.WriteLine("\nThe name of the 'myDirectoryEntry' " + "directory entry that corresponds to the " + "'mySearchResult' search result is : {0}\n", myDirectoryEntry.Name); ``` ```cpp# // Get the 'DirectoryEntry' that corresponds to 'mySearchResult'. DirectoryEntry^ myDirectoryEntry = mySearchResult->GetDirectoryEntry(); Console::WriteLine( String::Concat("\nThe name of the 'myDirectoryEntry' ", "directory entry that corresponds to the ", "'mySearchResult' search result is : {0}\n"), myDirectoryEntry->Name); ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Path As String
public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可唯一識別在 Active Directory 網域服務階層架構中的這個項目。The property uniquely identifies this entry in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy. 項目一律可以使用此路徑來擷取。The entry can always be retrieved using this path. ## Examples 下列範例是在此範例的摘錄。The following example is an excerpt of the example in . 原始範例建立新物件所要的路徑，並使用方法以初始化搜尋。The original example creates a new object with the desired path and uses the method to initiate the search. 在執行搜尋之後, 此範例會使用方法來擷取即時的目錄項目在搜尋結果中所識別。After performing the search, the example uses the method to retrieve the live directory entry that is identified in the search results. 此範例顯示如何剖析從搜尋結果的屬性。This example shows how to parse the property from the search result. ```vb Dim mySearchResultPath As String = mySearchResult.Path Console.WriteLine("The path for the 'mySearchResult' search result is : {0}" + _ ControlChars.Newline, mySearchResultPath) ``` ```csharp string mySearchResultPath = mySearchResult.Path; Console.WriteLine("The path for the 'mySearchResult' search " + "result is : {0}\n", mySearchResultPath); ``` ```cpp# String^ mySearchResultPath = mySearchResult->Path; Console::WriteLine("The path for the 'mySearchResult' search result is : {0}\n", mySearchResultPath); ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Properties As ResultPropertyCollection

summary.span: 取得這個物件之屬性的 集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of properties for this object.
A of properties set on this object.
